page.title: 01Summary Of Our Area.
page.content: Our area includes{Shawbury {R.A.F base}and two villages.They are { {Grinshill}and {Shawbury.}The largest of these villages is Shawbury. The R.A.F station takes up one quarter of the area. The rest of the area is covered by{farmland}with some{ {woodland.}The woodland is mainly {deciduous}trees. Most of the farmland is covered by crops. There are two schools in our area. These are {St. Mary's C.E.School which is a primary school and{Acton {Reynalds school,}which is a girls boarding school. There are two main roads running through the area. These roads are the {A53}from Shrewsbury to Newcastle Under Lyme which runs through Shawbury and the other is the {A49}which runs from Shrewsbury to Whitchurch.
